rules_text:
Lifelink
[i]Royal Secrecy[/i] – When Elincia, Princess of Crimea enters, create a Royal Role token and attach it to her. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}.)[/i]
[i]Mend[/i] – Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, support 1.
